User-agent: *
Allow: /
Allow: /auth
Allow: /dashboard
Allow: /privacy
Allow: /terms
Allow: /support
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /api/
Disallow: /*.json$
Disallow: /?*sort=

# Sitemaps
Sitemap: https://omnishare.ai/sitemap.xml

# Crawl delay
Crawl-delay: 0.5

# Specific search engines
User-agent: Googlebot
Allow: /
Crawl-delay: 0

User-agent: Bingbot
Allow: /
Crawl-delay: 1
